roleset.name: scintillate

role.descr: causer of scintillation, agent (transitive clauses only)
thing scintillating, theme (intranstiive subject, transitive object)

example.name: regular usage (intransitive)
example.text: It scintillated among the finest jeweller's workshops in Paris, New York, and St. Petersburg.
example.arg: in Paris, New York, and St. Petersburg
